oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Names of animals, mainly identified at the Museum (B II. 358 and 359, 366-368, XXV. 2341-2344, 2349 and 2350; L II.-2 288-291); further, by /a!kunta (LI.-2. 184-188); and lastly in the Katkop dialect by #kasin (B XXV. 2381-2384, or 2424-2428; L IV.-1. 3448-3451).
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences: given by =kasin
